alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery and southeastern Carbon Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Green River, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green River, Woodside and Elgin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 150 and 166. US Route 6 between mile markers 277 and 300. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 158 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
